card_text: Once per turn, if an activated card effect tosses coins, immediately after it resolves, apply the following effect(s), depending on the number of heads.$N●1+: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.$N●2+: Destroy 1 card your opponent controls.$N●3+: Look at your opponent's hand and discard 1 card from their hand.$NWhen an effect is activated that tosses a coin 2 or more times: You can banish this card from the GY; treat all results as heads.
